name: Dice Souls
description:
Dice Souls Synopsis

You found a cursed die and now you need to get rid of it without it ever touching the ground!

Rumor has it curses befall on the one to drop this die.

Maybe if you die you can upgrade some stats, maybe...

Controls
  • A / D -> Move
  • Space -> Jump
  • Mouse -> Aim
  • Left click -> Shoot die!
Credits
  • Maxime "Vylozeny" Fieffé -> Programming / Sound Design
  • Clément  "Piou" Lardenois -> Art / Animation
  • Caro "Caro" Panda -> Art
  • Loïc "MetalFox Dioxymore" Parra -> Programming / Music
  • Guillaume "Youhou" Sarramegna -> Programming

This game was made in 48h for the 2022 GMTK GameJam.
